post:
And dropped something for our present (pun intended) and future customers !
For one day/one time only, all Prometeus customers have 16 % off any purchase, be it credits for iwstack, new iwstack account, new VPS, etc. It applies to all products, old and new (for those without stock, if you are an existing customer, please open a ticket and we will do our best to find you a slot).  
Happy holidays and a happy new year :)  
Oh, almost forgot, the code is BABBO16 for our sweet 16th year :)
